name: @tadashi/svelte-optin
description: Create opt-in components for Svelte apps.
readme:
# optin

Svelte component

## Install

```
$ npm i -S @tadashi/svelte-optin
```

## Usage

```html
<script
  type="module"
  src="https://unpkg.com/@tadashi/svelte-optin@{VERSION}/dist/Optin.js"
></script>

<tadashi-optin
  endpoint="https://services-uat.teleport.com.br/mol-rest/GravaOptin"
  endpoint_nimble="https://uat.nimble.com.br/api/token"
></tadashi-optin>

<script>
  const tadashiOptin = document.querySelector('tadashi-optin')
  globalThis.addEventListener('tadashi_optin:nope', console.log)
  globalThis.addEventListener('tadashi_optin:save', console.log)
  globalThis.addEventListener('tadashi_optin:notify', console.log)
</script>
```
